name: Lord's Reincarnation III
description:
After the great battle between God and Lucifer the world was thrown into a state of chaos. Many lost their lives while others survived to rebuild the world. A few centuries later, the world managed to stabilize itself with its inhabitants being human, demons, angels and powerful deities.

You will play the role of Leon Wilder a young man that who his small island home town to join a guild, so that he may earn money to provide for his ill mother. 

The world has a lot more than meets the eye so come on and join the adventure!

*This game contains topics that might trigger those with religious beliefs. Player discretion is advised.

THIS GAME INCLUDES:

*A battle system somewhat similar to games like Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne, Shin Megami Tensei IV: Apocalypse and Persona!

*Three main playable characters : Leon Wilder, Medoka Lavender and Laura Silvers! Each plays super differently than the other so have fun combining their abilities!

*Challenging but fair enemies, that said, they will not hesitate to utterly destroy you if you get too cocky. (Keep you head in the game!)

*A ten episode story that is full to the brim with lore and interesting characters.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Creator's Notes:-

This is a story I've working on all by my lonesome for years making games are really hard! (Who would have thought, huh?)

Anyway... I ask everyone who comes across this game to at least give it a try and to leave a unfiltered review so that I may when or where I fell short so I may improve in the future.

My dream as a little kid was always to make and play games with my very own team.     This is my first step to achieve that goal.

Thank you all so much for you time and ENJOY THE GAME!
